response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I'm confident it will bring unparalleled benefits to you. Considering its quality and uniqueness, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece that not only meets but surpasses industry standards, offering you a level of performance and satisfaction unmatched by competitors. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 12000}
